raiseExcessNumber: You cannot raise bet with an amount bigger than your own tips!
raiseInvalidNumber: You can only raise bet with a valid number!
initialMessagePrefix: You currently own (**bold** cards will not be shown to other players):
initialMessageDescription:
The first stage is drawing and standing, starting from the player who has the largest card on the table. You can type `draw` to draw a new card, or `stand` if you are satisfied with your deck.

{cardsNames}
initialMessageTitle: The Black Jack game is starting!
initialMessageFooter: Please wait until all players are ready.
call: {playerName} chose to call. The highest bet is still {highestBet}.
fold: {playerName} chose to fold. {playerName} no longer {verb} in betting.
raise:
{playerName} chose to raise the bet with {diff}. The highest bet is now {highestBet}.
All players now have to bet {highestBet} plus their initial bets to call.
allin:
{playerName} chose to all-in! Looks like he/she's now very confident that he/she is going to win this one!
All players now have to bet {highestBet} plus their initial bets to call.
progressingFooter: Type `draw` to draw a card, or type `stand` to stop drawing.
turnMessageDescription:
To raise bet, type `raise <amount>`. **You cannot raise bet with an amount bigger than the tips you currently have.**
To use up all your tips and bet on the table, type `allin`.
To follow the highest bet in the present and participate in the following gambling, type `call`.
To give up this game without any further betting, type `fold`. **You'll lose the tips you already bet, regardless of the outcome.**
gamblingInitialMessage: All players have entered standing stage. It's time for betting!
